oracle.spatial.network.nfe.vis.maps.tools

Interface Tool

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Layer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTool, NFEAddFeatureElementTool, NFEAddFeatureTool, NFEBoxSelectionTool, NFEEditVertexTool, NFEFeatureElementSelectionTool, NFEFeatureSelectionTool, NFEManipulateTool, NFENetElementSelectionTool, NFESelectionTool, NFETool

    public interface Tool
extends Layer
    A map tool defines what actions to be taken upon user input events.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface oracle.spatial.network.nfe.vis.maps.core.Layer

      boolean isInAction()
